item.title: Expectile Regularization for Fast and Accurate Training of Neural Optimal Transport
item.description: ENOT, a new Neural Optimal Transport training method, achieves 3x quality and 10x speed improvements by using expectile regularization to stabilize the learning process.

item.title: Improving the Learning Capability of Small-size Image Restoration Network by Deep Fourier Shifting
item.description: Deep Fourier Shifting boosts small image restoration networks by using an information-lossless Fourier cycling shift operator, improving performance across various low-level tasks while reducing compu…
